text: Minoru Miki (; 16 March 1930 â€“ 8 December 2011 in Tokushima) was a Japanese composer. He wrote opera and modern Japanese music. He was one of the first members of the group Pro Musica Nipponia. He died early in the morning on 8 December 2011. Miki was 81 years old. ==References== Category:Japanese musicians Category:2011 deaths Category:1930 births Category:People from Tokushima Prefecture
title: Minoru Miki
